name: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
description: Develops and applies intelligent systems that can perform tasks that typically require human intelligence, such as visual perception, speech recognition, and decision-making.

name: Biotechnology
description: Applies biological systems, living organisms, or derivatives thereof, to develop innovative products, technologies, and services that improve human life and the health of the planet.

name: Cloud Computing and Storage
description: Provides on-demand access to a shared pool of computing resources, including servers, storage, databases, software, and applications, over the internet.

name: Cybersecurity
description: Protects computer systems, networks, and sensitive information from unauthorized access, theft, damage, or disruption, using various technologies and practices.

name: Data Analytics and Science
description: Extracts insights and knowledge from structured and unstructured data using various techniques, including statistics, machine learning, and data mining, to inform business decisions.

name: Internet of Things (IoT)
description: Connects and integrates physical devices, sensors, and systems, enabling them to collect and exchange data, and interact with the physical world and other devices.

name: Life Sciences and Diagnostics
description: Develops and commercializes products, services, and technologies that improve human health, including medical devices, pharmaceuticals, and diagnostic tools.

name: Materials Science and Nanotechnology
description: Develops and applies new materials and nanoscale technologies to create innovative products, devices, and systems with unique properties and applications.

name: Networking and Communications
description: Enables the exchange of information between devices, systems, and people, using various technologies, including wireless, wired, and satellite communications.

name: Optics and Photonics
description: Develops and applies technologies that manipulate light and its properties to create innovative products, devices, and systems, including lasers, fiber optics, and imaging systems.

name: Robotics and Autonomous Systems
description: Designs and develops intelligent systems that can perform tasks autonomously, using sensors, actuators, and control systems, to interact with and adapt to their environment.

name: Software Development and Engineering
description: Designs, develops, tests, and maintains software applications, systems, and tools, using various programming languages, frameworks, and methodologies.
